org.jgrapes.core.AttachedComponent

  • Packages that use AttachedComponent 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.core
    This package defines the interfaces and classes that provide the core functionality of JGrapes.

      Methods in org.jgrapes.core with type parameters of type AttachedComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends AttachedComponent>
      T      		 Manager.attach(T child)
      Attaches the given component node (or complete tree) as a child to the component managed by this manager.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.core that return AttachedComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AttachedComponent Manager.detach()
      Detaches the component managed by this manager (with its children, if any) from the component tree that it currently belongs to.
      protected AttachedComponent Component.getComponent() 
      AttachedComponent Manager.getParent()
      Returns the parent of the component managed by this manager.
      AttachedComponent Manager.getRoot()
      Returns the root of the tree the component managed by this manager belongs to.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.core that return types with arguments of type AttachedComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<AttachedComponent> Manager.getChildren()
      Returns the child components of the component managed by this manager as unmodifiable list.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.core with parameters of type AttachedComponent 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Manager Components.manager(AttachedComponent component)
      Returns a component's manager.
      static void Components.start(AttachedComponent application)
      Fires a Start event with an associated Started completion event on the broadcast channel of the given application and wait for the completion of the Start event.
